short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring AI power to your browser with the ChatGPT App!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT App lets you tap into the power of OpenAI's language model without leaving the website you are visiting. With the ChatGPT App, you can get instant and helpful responses to inquiries with a click on the button in your browser's toolbar. This powerful extension helps you save time and effort by providing natural and human-like answers to your questions.


ChatGPT App seamlessly integrates with all popular browsers, including Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Firefox. You'll never have to switch between multiple tabs or windows again. You'll always have access to the latest and most powerful language models with support for all popular OpenAI APIs, including GPT-3.5-Turbo, GPT-3, and GPT-4.


This feature enables you to get helpful responses to inquiries while browsing any website, allowing you to get the information you need without leaving the page you're on. ChatGPT App makes it easy to chat with ChatGPT directly from the extension and ask questions in a natural and human-like way.


ChatGPT App also features markdown rendering, code highlighting, and dark mode, allowing you to customize the extension to your liking. You can even provide feedback to improve ChatGPT and use custom trigger mode.


With ChatGPT App, you can now access the power of ChatGPT anywhere on the web, making it an essential tool for anyone looking to get helpful responses to their inquiries.


Using ChatGPT App is easy. Log in to https://chat.openai.com, install the extension, and chat with ChatGPT directly from your search engine results page. If you encounter any issues, report a bug in the review section of the extension's page.


Please note that the ChatGPT App doesn't support or endorse using other ChatGPT extensions in parallel. Make sure to uninstall all other ChatGPT extensions before installing the ChatGPT App.

Our extension is 100% free, and we want to keep it that way!
With our Support-Mode activated, you enable us to display our very non-intrusive Ad Partners logo in your search results.
If you visit the website of one of our Ad Partner, you contribute to the developement of our extension.
